Package index

All functions

admin
Admin data (non-probability survey)
check_balance()
Check the variable balance between the probability and non-probability samples
confint(<nonprob>)
Confidence Intervals for Model Parameters
control_inf()
Control parameters for inference
control_out()
Control parameters for outcome model
control_sel()
Control parameters for the selection model
jvs
Job Vacancy Survey
method_glm()
Function for the mass imputation model using glm
method_nn()
Mass imputation using the nearest neighbours method
method_npar()
Function for the mass imputation model using nonparametric method
method_pmm()
Mass imputation using the predictive mean matching method
method_ps()
Propensity score model
nonprob() nonprob_dr() nonprob_mi()
Inference with non-probability survey samples
pop_size()
Returns population size (estimated or fixed)
summary(<nonprob>)
Summary statistics for model of the nonprob class.
vcov(<nonprob>)
Obtain Covariance Matrix estimation.
